author: epunzalan
msg: Fixed a bug, apparently caused by a change in 2.0.3, that an artifact sent to a ResolutionListener have a null scope.

author: chirino
msg: If multiple concurrent threads were creating vm://localhost connection, it was possible multiple "localhost" broker would be started.

author: chirino
msg: Avoid starting a persistence adapter if the broker is stop()ed before once has been created.
